com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.layers

Class RasterLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.layers.Layer
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.layers.RasterLayer

  • @UiThread
public class RasterLayer
extends Layer
    Raster map textures such as satellite imagery.
    See Also:
